page.title: 16The Village Shop
page.content: Bowes has two shops.Brown's Store is open part-time and sells fancy goods and confectionary with some craft goods.The other is also the sub postoffice.The two facets of this are complementary and one may not be able to exist in isolation.As government agencies seek to pay pensions and allowances monthly into bank accounts so the number of transactions that take place in the sub postoffice and hence its income drops.Many people still shop daily at the sub postoffice but shopping patterns are changing and families with personal transport often shop weekly or monthly at large supermarkets to try to save money.this decline in custom has led to the closure of many small units in rural areas.A County Durham Association of Rural Shopkeepers has just been formed to give support to reverse this trend.
